name: Carnival Games (itch)
description:
Attending a carnival you hop on the teacup ride which takes you to various sideshows
which you attempt to score well on each.

Requires: a working gyroscope and a touchscreen

1>DuckShoot
2>Bowling
3>Hoop Toss
4>Toilet throw

The controls are a simple matter of tilting the device to aim and steer and pressing the screen. The bowling you have to hold down the button on the screen to change angle of the ball by tilting your device otherwise it moves it and you need to press the shoot button to bowl it
